question: What is TriPy?
answer: TriPy is the Trivandrum Python Community - a volunteer-driven group of Python enthusiasts who organize monthly meetups, workshops, and project nights to promote Python programming in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala.

question: Do I need to know Python to attend?
answer: Not at all! We welcome everyone from complete beginners to experienced developers. Our meetups often include beginner-friendly talks and we have a supportive community ready to help you learn.

question: How can I give a talk at a meetup?
answer: We'd love to have you speak! Reach out to us via Telegram/Whatsapp with your talk idea. We welcome both full talks (20-30 min) and lightning talks (5-10 min) on any Python-related topic.

question: Is there a registration fee?
answer: No! All TriPy events are completely free to attend. We believe in keeping our community accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or financial situation.

question: How can my company become a venue partner?
answer: We're always looking for companies to host our meetups! Contact us via our Telegram/Whatsapp communities. Venue partners get recognition at the event, on our website, and a chance to connect with talented Python developers in Trivandrum.

question: How do I stay updated about events?
answer: Join our Telegram group (https://t.me/TrivandrumPython) or WhatsApp community for event announcements, discussions, and updates. You can also follow us on Twitter and check this website regularly.
